path.style: vector-effect: none; fill: none; stroke: rgb(124, 181, 236); stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 2px; opacity: 1;
vector-effect: none; fill: none; stroke: rgb(67, 67, 72); stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 2px; opacity: 1;
vector-effect: none; fill: none; stroke: rgb(144, 237, 125); stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-width: 2px; opacity: 1;

text.style: font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', 'Noto Sans', 'Liberation Sans', Arial, sans-serif, 'Apple Color Emoji', 'Segoe UI Emoji', 'Segoe UI Symbol', 'Noto Color Emoji'; font-size: 10px; fill: rgb(80, 80, 80); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

text.tspan: pairtools: Pairs by distance and orientation

text.style: opacity: 1; font-family: system-ui, -apple-system, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', 'Noto Sans', 'Liberation Sans', Arial, sans-serif, 'Apple Color Emoji', 'Segoe UI Emoji', 'Segoe UI Symbol', 'Noto Color Emoji'; font-size: 14px; fill: rgb(100, 100, 100); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;
